name: HR Wallingford Ltd
goal:
HR Wallingford works with a range of clients in the water sector to complete research and consultancy for policy makers, regional planners, the European Commission, water companies and developers. Our research enables us to help clients solve water management problems.

We work with clients to promote good water governance, provide reliable water resources for industrial, municipal and agricultural needs, improve water quality and enhance the environment.

We provide expert advice on water related problems in various sectors, including flooding, coasts, maritime, energy and environment. This enables effective development, engineering and policy making in these areas.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Information Society, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: HR Wallingford is a private, not for profit research and consultancy company within the environmental water sector. We participate in research including European research and have a long track record through Framework Programmes 5, 6, 7 and Horizon 2020 including leading and participating in large consortium projects. We also contribute to EMODnet by leading and participating in projects seeking to improve the use of marine data across Europe.
